highlight.en: Thailand's top scuba diving hub with access to Racha Islands, Similan Islands, and Phi Phi. From beginner discover dives to 3-day PADI certification, Phuket offers world-class underwater experiences year-round.
highlight.nl: Thailand's top duikbestemming met toegang tot de Racha-eilanden, Similan-eilanden en Phi Phi. Van beginners-duiken tot 3-daagse PADI-certificering, Phuket biedt wereldklasse onderwaterervaringen het hele jaar door.

highlight.en: Krabi is a paradise for snorkeling and island hopping. Explore the stunning 4 Islands, 7 Islands, Hong Islands, and Phi Phi by longtail boat or speedboat with crystal-clear waters and vibrant marine life.
highlight.nl: Krabi is een paradijs voor snorkelen en eilandhoppen. Verken de prachtige 4 Eilanden, 7 Eilanden, Hong Eilanden en Phi Phi per longtailboot of speedboot met kristalhelder water en levendig zeeleven.
